summary: Man harassed a woman online and offline.
judgment_text: Accused found guilty under IPC 354D and 509.

summary: A man was convicted for sexual assault against a minor girl.
judgment_text: The court sentenced the accused under IPC 376 for sexual assault.

summary: Online harassment case involving social media threats and stalking.
judgment_text: The court found the accused guilty of online harassment under IPC 354D and 509.

summary: Sexual assault case with criminal intimidation against a minor.
judgment_text: Accused convicted under IPC 376 for sexual assault and IPC 506 for criminal intimidation.

summary: Domestic violence case involving dowry harassment and criminal breach of trust.
judgment_text: Court found evidence of dowry harassment under IPC 498A and criminal breach of trust under IPC 406.

summary: Workplace sexual harassment case with physical assault.
judgment_text: Accused found guilty of workplace sexual harassment under IPC 354A and 354B.

summary: Cyber fraud case involving online cheating and criminal breach of trust.
judgment_text: Court convicted the accused under IPC 420 for cheating and IPC 406 for criminal breach of trust.

summary: Legal case 6 involving harassment and criminal intimidation.
judgment_text: Court found the accused guilty in case 6 under relevant IPC sections.
